title: Giants expectations, NFL Duos, Chiefs without Tyreek Hill,  80's Decade Dynamos, and Patriots coaches
itunes:title: Giants expectations, NFL Duos, Chiefs without Tyreek Hill,  80's Decade Dynamos, and Patriots coaches
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins with the birthday of Giants QB Daniel Jones. Hosts Peter Schrager, Rachel Bonnetta, Adam Rank and Fmr NFL DB DeAngelo Hall discuss what to expect from the Giants in the NFC East.  With a nod to Top Gun:Maverick, the table gives their favorite current and all-time NFL duo. Peter explains how the Chiefs will figure out moving forward without Tyreek Hill.  Will Selva takes over Decade Dynamos with his roster from the 1980's.  We wrap up the week with questions surrounding the Patriots coaching staff after Josh McDaniels left for the Las Vegas Raiders.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
